info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 6 at 1:32AM CDT by NWS Nashville TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee...
Whites Creek At Bordeaux affecting Davidson County.
For the Nashville Metro Area...including Bordeaux...elevated river levels are forecast.
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Whites Creek at Bordeaux.
* WHEN...From early this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Water inundates the backyards of homes along Hamilton Ave in the Bordeaux area.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 14.4 feet and falling. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 145 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
